# dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
variable:
  description: a variable
  default: non
```
# dictionaries/rougail/01-redefine.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
variable:
  redefine: true
  multi: true
  default:
    - non
```
